remarks: Group multiple (exponentiation) operation at a positive integer. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgnn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgnn.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
mulgnn.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgnn.s $e |- S = seq 1 ( .+ , ( NN X. { X } ) ) $.
mulgnn $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ X e. B ) -> ( N .x. X ) = ( S ` N ) ) $.
